title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hostable LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, run and chat with models like Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library (pip install ollama) that wraps the local Ollama REST API for synchronous and asynchronous chat, generate, embed and pull operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client (npm i ollama) for browser, Node and Bun; provides typed promises and streaming helpers for every Ollama endpoint.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM and embeddings provider inside LangChain with one-line instantiation.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI). Markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible proxy.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with conversation history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library (Maven Central) providing typed builders for chat, generate, pull and embedding endpoints with reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem (gem install ollama) that exposes the full Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby blocks and enumerable streams.

title: ollama-chat-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands, supports thread isolation and model switching.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and example compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama containerised with optional CUDA / ROCm support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package (PyPI: ollama-haystack) exposing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client (NuGet: Ollama) with async enumerable streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Curated list of 30+ GGUF models officially maintained in Ollama’s library (Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) with one-line pull.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to build a local question-answering system without external APIs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to a local Ollama model for summarization, translation or continuation inside your knowledge base.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM commands on notes: summarize, rewrite, translate, or generate text using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit (20k+ members) for sharing models, mods, troubleshooting and showcase projects around the Ollama ecosystem.

title: ollama-hacker-news
summary: Hacker News launch thread discussing Ollama v0.1.0 with 300+ comments on performance, GPU offloading and comparison to llama.cpp.
